title: BIG FACTS feat. GLORILLA
itunes:title: BIG FACTS feat. GLORILLA
description:
New female rapper GloRilla stops by BIG FACTS to discuss the success of her FNF single, signing with Yo Gotti's CMG, her admiration for Chief Keef and more!
